glosses: to continue with, to continue doing something

examples.text: Sonra bakacaksın / Göreceksin çaren yok / Devam edeceksin / Yalandan yaşamaya
examples.translation: Then you will look / You will see you have no choice / You will continue / To live a lie

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish دوام ایتمك (devâm etmek). By surface analysis, devam (“continuation”) + etmek (“to make, do, render”).
